posts.author: Steve Anderson
posts.title: How to get the job in IT sphere?
posts.content: It's easy. Work hard or die trying :)

posts.author: Steve Jobs
posts.title: Would your former employer talk about your strengths and weaknesses if I asked him to?
posts.content: Of course, my former employer will answer all the questions.

posts.author: James Metue
posts.title: Thank you for coming, now the interview is in your hands.
posts.content: Thank you for the invitation, I will be happy to be part of your team.

posts.author: Nataly Jamerson
posts.title: How did you prepare for this interview?
posts.content: I was looking for all the information, trying to learn everything you need for this project

posts.author: Jennifer Armstrong
posts.title: What do you know about us?
posts.content: I know that you are developing software for outsourcing companies.
